languages.text: {n}Чудище равнодушно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Наверное. Так живут на шпилях".
{n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."
languages.original_text: {n}Чудище равнодушно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Наверное. Так живут на шпилях".

traits.locale_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Probably will. That's life in the spires."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Indifférente, l'abomination se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « Peut-être. C'est ça, la vie dans les tours. »
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Indifférente, l'abomination se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « Peut-être. C'est ça, la vie dans les tours. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}怪物不以为然地耸了耸肩。{/n}“或许吧，尖塔里的生活就是这样。”
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物不以为然地耸了耸肩。{/n}“或许吧，尖塔里的生活就是这样。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}忌まわしき者は無関心そうに肩をすくめた。{/n}「そうかもな。それが尖塔での生活だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}忌まわしき者は無関心そうに肩をすくめた。{/n}「そうかもな。それが尖塔での生活だ」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Die Abscheulichkeit zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Könnte passieren. Die Türme werden dafür sorgen."
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Abscheulichkeit zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Könnte passieren. Die Türme werden dafür sorgen."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La abominación se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «Podría ser. Así es la vida en las torres».
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}La abominación se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «Podría ser. Así es la vida en las torres».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Garabet, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Olabilir. Kulelerde hayat böyledir."
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Perhaps. That's life in the spires."
